1000100010111011 1011001101111001 1 -> sum: 0011110000110101, cout: 1
0011011110001110 0010011111101100 1 -> sum: 0101111101111011, cout: 0
1000101101110010 0001010010101000 0 -> sum: 1010000000011010, cout: 0
1110011010011010 1101100110011011 0 -> sum: 1100000000110101, cout: 1

1011101101101001 0000010110110110 0 -> sum: 1100000100011111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
